description: Gameplay: introduces a new Poison Gas trap that creates a persistent toxic cloud (poisons entities), fully integrated with diffusion/decay, rendering, trap spawning tables, and save/load (SAVE_VERSION 36). Includes UI look text + unit tests.
summary: Added a new trap type: Poison Gas — creates a persistent toxic cloud that poisons entities standing in it.
Poison gas is stored per-level, diffuses/decays over time, is rendered on the map, and is serialized in save files (SAVE_VERSION bumped to 36).
Updated trap spawning tables (doors, caches, labs, chests), UI look text, automove trap penalties, and added unit tests (trap behavior + save/load roundtrip).
